message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to your business. It's truly one-of-a-kind.  To kick things off, I'm offering it to you for $1,300,000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchasing it, but I need to be mindful of our company's budget.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I understand budget constraints, but the value of this product is undeniable.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,150,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget with your latest offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so how about $1,025,000?
